title: Provided further that HPC may consider after veryfing traffing simulation study to allow CDS on a plot having access from existing minimum 12m
clause_text: Provided further that HPC may consider after veryfing traffing simulation study to allow CDS on a plot having access from existing minimum 12m. wide dead end road originating from 18
